product.title: Salon Edition Hair Styling Brush Iron | Smooth 2nd Day Hair Styles (1 in)
product.description: Create smooth styles and perfect the final touch with the Salon Edition 1" Professional brush iron. A one inch barrel works well with short to medium hair lengths, bangs & layers, and wisps. The barrel is equipped with soft, ball-tipped bristles that gently work through strands for smooth results and comfortable styling. High/low heat settings for styling variety and great performance on various hair types. Built for comfort with a cool tip and contoured comfort handle. One year limited warranty guarantees gorgeous styles.
product.description_html: Create smooth styles and perfect the final touch with the Salon Edition 1" Professional brush iron. A one inch barrel works well with short to medium hair lengths, bangs & layers, and wisps. The barrel is equipped with soft, ball-tipped bristles that gently work through strands for smooth results and comfortable styling. High/low heat settings for styling variety and great performance on various hair types. Built for comfort with a cool tip and contoured comfort handle. One year limited warranty guarantees gorgeous styles.
product.description_full:
Create smooth styles and perfect the final touch with the Salon Edition 1" Professional brush iron. A one inch barrel works well with short to medium hair lengths, bangs & layers, and wisps. The barrel is equipped with soft, ball-tipped bristles that gently work through strands for smooth results and comfortable styling. High/low heat settings for styling variety and great performance on various hair types. Built for comfort with a cool tip and contoured comfort handle. One year limited warranty guarantees gorgeous styles. * GREAT FOR 2ND DAY STYLING: Use on dry or recently blow-dried hair to give it that extra volume. Allow hair to cool before combing or brushing
 * SOFT BALL TIPPED BRISTLES: Gives you the right amount of grip to gently work through hair for comfortable styling
 * HEAT SETTINGS: 2 Heat options for various hair type. High Heat Up to 338 F. Not Dual Voltage.
 * PROFESSIONAL CORD: 6 ft Swivel Cord for easy movement while styling and no cord kinks.
 * ERGONOMIC: Handle and Cool Tip Built for comfortable styling
product.description_full_html:
Create smooth styles and perfect the final touch with the Salon Edition 1" Professional brush iron. A one inch barrel works well with short to medium hair lengths, bangs & layers, and wisps. The barrel is equipped with soft, ball-tipped bristles that gently work through strands for smooth results and comfortable styling. High/low heat settings for styling variety and great performance on various hair types. Built for comfort with a cool tip and contoured comfort handle. One year limited warranty guarantees gorgeous styles.
  • GREAT FOR 2ND DAY STYLING: Use on dry or recently blow-dried hair to give it that extra volume. Allow hair to cool before combing or brushing
  • SOFT BALL TIPPED BRISTLES: Gives you the right amount of grip to gently work through hair for comfortable styling
  • HEAT SETTINGS: 2 Heat options for various hair type. High Heat Up to 338 F. Not Dual Voltage.
  • PROFESSIONAL CORD: 6 ft Swivel Cord for easy movement while styling and no cord kinks.
  • ERGONOMIC: Handle and Cool Tip Built for comfortable styling
